Text: There is a single voice speaking some foreign language (I'm guessing Polish, since some of the printed gibberish above seems to be Polish) dubbed over the original English soundtrack on both channels, loud enough to make the English voices inaudible, and this loud translator cannot be silenced. English-speakers should not download this, in other words, and fuck all y'all who couldn't be bothered to warn the rest of us.
Well, Lazarusl, I believe it's not that hard to guess the file is in Polish, since you've got "PL" in the name of a torrent. Keep calm and go fuck somewhere else.
